headline: How Bank of America’s AI Demand Concerns At Digital Realty Trust (DLR) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In recent days, Bank of America downgraded Digital Realty Trust from Buy to Neutral, highlighting slower progress in capturing artificial intelligence-related data center demand and limited exposure to newer growth markets. This reassessment contrasts with other banks’ more optimistic views and throws fresh attention on how Digital Realty’s market focus could shape its growth profile. We’ll now examine how concerns about Digital Realty’s slower participation in AI-driven demand could...
